verses.verse: If<WG1487> therefore<WG3767> there is any<WG5100> encouragement<WG3874> in Christ,<WG5547> if<WG1487> there is any<WG5100> consolation<WG3890> of love,<WG26> if<WG1487> there is any<WG5100> fellowship<WG2842> of the Spirit,<WG4151> if<WG1487> any<WG5100> affection<WG4698> and compassion,<WG3628>

make<WG4137> my joy<WG5479> complete<WG4137> by being of the same<WG846> mind,<WG5426> maintaining<WG2192> the same<WG846> love,<WG26> united<WG4861> in spirit,<WG4861> intent<WG5426> on one<WG1520> purpose.<WG5426>

Do nothing<WG3367> from selfishness<WG2052> or<WG3366> empty<WG2754> conceit,<WG2754> but with humility<WG5012> of mind<WG5012> let each<WG240> of you regard<WG2233> one<WG240> another<WG240> as more<WG5242> important<WG5242> than himself;<WG1438>
do not [merely] look<WG4648> out for your own<WG1438> personal<WG1538> interests, but also<WG2532> for the interests of others.<WG2087>
Have<WG5426> this<WG3778> attitude<WG5426> in yourselves<WG4771> which<WG3739> was also<WG2532> in Christ<WG5547> Jesus,<WG2424>
who,<WG3739> although He existed<WG5225> in the form<WG3444> of God,<WG2316> did not regard<WG2233> equality<WG2470> with God<WG2316> a thing<WG725> to be grasped,<WG725>
but emptied<WG2758> Himself,<WG1438> taking<WG2983> the form<WG3444> of a bond-servant, [and] being<WG1096> made<WG1096> in the likeness<WG3667> of men.<WG444>

And being found<WG2147> in appearance<WG4976> as a man,<WG444> He humbled<WG5013> Himself<WG1438> by becoming<WG1096> obedient<WG5255> to the point<WG3360> of death,<WG2288> even<WG1161> death<WG2288> on a cross.<WG4716>
Therefore<WG1352> also<WG2532> God<WG2316> highly<WG5251> exalted<WG5251> Him, and bestowed<WG5483> on Him the name<WG3686> which is above<WG5228> every<WG3956> name,<WG3686>
that at the name<WG3686> of Jesus<WG2424> every<WG3956> knee<WG1119> should bow,<WG2578> of those who are in heaven,<WG2032> and on earth,<WG1919> and under<WG2709> the earth,<WG2709>
and that every<WG3956> tongue<WG1100> should confess<WG1843> that Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> is Lord,<WG2962> to the glory<WG1391> of God<WG2316> the Father.<WG3962>

So<WG5620> then,<WG5620> my beloved,<WG27> just<WG2531> as you have always<WG3842> obeyed,<WG5219> not as in my presence<WG3952> only,<WG3440> but now<WG3568> much<WG4183> more<WG3123> in my absence,<WG666> work<WG2716> out your salvation<WG4991> with fear<WG5401> and trembling;<WG5156>
for it is God<WG2316> who is at work<WG1754> in you, both<WG2532> to will<WG2309> and to work<WG1754> for [His] good<WG2107> pleasure.<WG2107>
Do<WG4160> all<WG3956> things<WG3956> without<WG5565> grumbling<WG1112> or<WG2532> disputing;<WG1261>

that you may prove<WG1096> yourselves to be blameless<WG273> and innocent,<WG185> children<WG5043> of God<WG2316> above<WG299> reproach<WG299> in the midst<WG3319> of a crooked<WG4646> and perverse<WG1294> generation,<WG1074> among<WG1722> whom<WG3739> you appear<WG5316> as lights<WG5458> in the world,<WG2889>

holding<WG1907> fast<WG1907> the word<WG3056> of life,<WG2222> so<WG1519> that in the day<WG2250> of Christ<WG5547> I may have cause<WG2745> to glory<WG2745> because<WG3754> I did not run<WG5143> in vain<WG2756> nor<WG3761> toil<WG2872> in vain.<WG2756>

But even<WG2532> if<WG1487> I am being poured<WG4689> out as a drink<WG4689> offering<WG4689> upon the sacrifice<WG2378> and service<WG3009> of your faith,<WG4102> I rejoice<WG5463> and share<WG4796> my joy<WG4796> with you all.<WG3956>
And you too,<WG2532> [I urge you,] rejoice<WG5463> in the same<WG846> way<WG846> and share<WG4796> your joy<WG4796> with me.

But I hope<WG1679> in the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> to send<WG3992> Timothy<WG5095> to you shortly,<WG5030> so<WG2443> that I also<WG2532> may be encouraged<WG2174> when I learn<WG1097> of your condition.<WG3588> <WG4012>
For I have<WG2192> no<WG3762> one<WG3762> [else] of kindred<WG2473> spirit<WG2473> who<WG3748> will genuinely<WG1104> be concerned<WG3309> for your welfare.<WG3588>
For they all<WG3956> seek<WG2212> after<WG2212> their own<WG1438> interests, not those<WG3588> of Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>
But you know<WG1097> of his proven<WG1382> worth<WG1382> that he served<WG1398> with me in the furtherance of the gospel<WG2098> like<WG5613> a child<WG5043> [serving] his father.<WG3962>
Therefore<WG3767> I hope<WG1679> to send<WG3992> him immediately,<WG1824> as soon as I see<WG872> how<WG872> things<WG3588> [go] with me;
and I trust<WG3982> in the Lord<WG2962> that I myself<WG846> also<WG2532> shall be coming<WG2064> shortly.<WG5030>

But I thought<WG2233> it necessary<WG316> to send<WG3992> to you Epaphroditus,<WG1891> my brother<WG80> and fellow<WG4904> worker<WG4904> and fellow<WG4961> soldier,<WG4961> who is also<WG1161> your messenger<WG652> and minister<WG3011> to my need;<WG5532>
because<WG1894> he was longing<WG1971> for you all<WG3956> and was distressed<WG85> because<WG1360> you had heard<WG191> that he was sick.<WG770>

For indeed<WG2532> he was sick<WG770> to the point<WG3897> of death,<WG2288> but God<WG2316> had<WG1653> mercy<WG1653> on him, and not on him only<WG3441> but also<WG2532> on me, lest<WG2443> <WG3361> I should have<WG2192> sorrow<WG3077> upon sorrow.<WG3077>

Therefore<WG3767> I have sent<WG3992> him all<WG4709> the more<WG4709> eagerly<WG4709> in order<WG2443> that when you see<WG3708> him again<WG3825> you may rejoice<WG5463> and I may be less<WG253> concerned<WG253> [about you.]
Therefore<WG3767> receive<WG4327> him in the Lord<WG2962> with all<WG3956> joy,<WG5479> and hold<WG2192> men<WG5108> like<WG5108> him in high<WG1784> regard;<WG1784>

because<WG3754> he came<WG1448> close<WG1448> to death<WG2288> for the work<WG2041> of Christ,<WG5547> risking<WG3850> his life<WG5590> to complete<WG378> what<WG5303> was deficient<WG5303> in your service<WG3009> to me.
